text: 23.3 Wkp 19.35, Lo 25.1-2, Mat 23.27-28, Jon 7.51 Anɨb agek, nop pakelak, Pol ne bɨawl yɨbɨl anɨb anop agak, God nep pen pakɨnɨgab agak. Nak wali tɨmel gup tek mɨdeban pen, sɨŋak tek pakɨpal we gɨl mɨdeb agak. God takaw ne nɨŋɨd, yɨp kot gɨpan ak pen, God takaw ne ak kelɨgɨl, nop monmon pakɨm apan agak.
